mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOG( BLOG_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_DDTM, REG_ID, DEL_YN ) SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(BLOG_SEQ), 0) +1) BLOG_SEQ, #{title}, #{contents}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), 'hongdan', 'N' FROM TB_BLOG
mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DDTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DDTM, REG_ID, DEL_YN FROM TB_BLOG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BLOG_SEQ DESC LIMIT ${currentPageNo} , ${pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_CNT FROM TB_BLOG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT BLOG_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DDTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DDTM, REG_ID, DEL_YN FROM TB_BLOG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BLOG_SEQ = #{blog_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BLOG SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DDTM = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE BLOG_SEQ = #{blog_seq}
